lead_paragraph: The Modern reworks its second-floor galleries; a new vision for the Armory Show; a 450-medal gift to the Frick; and a School of London show.

headline.main: MoMA Galleries to Change Their Focus

snippet: The Modern reworks its second-floor galleries; a new vision for the Armory Show; a 450-medal gift to the Frick; and a School of London show.
abstract: Robin Pogrebin Inside Art column; Museum of Modern Art plans major remodel of second-floor contemporary galleries; new Armory Show executive director Benjamin Genocchio plans to refocus vision and streamline 2017 fair; Frick collection plans exhibition of portrait medals, which were received as promised gift from Stephen K and Janie Woo Scher; Getty Museum will host exhibition of 80 works by artists from 'School of London'.
